reviewText: NOT ENJOYABLE! NOT FUNNY! NOT INTERESTING! I like side scrolling shooting games, and I am happy with fairly basic graphics. You would be better off opening notepad and moving the mouse around an assembly of characters you have placed on the screen than playing this game. There is not even the most basic 'physics simulation'; move your mouse and the sprite will be there immediately. The author of this game seems to have the most infantile sense of humour I have encountered. If you want a good side scrolling shooting game, please search for Stargunner and you will find it can be downloaded for free. If you want a quick and easy side scrolling shooting game, please search for Alpha Bounty and play it in your browser; it is many times better than this feeble attempt. This game is cheaper than a bar of chocolate, but I am going to request a refund anyway because I object to the fact that this rubbish can be placed on Steam, a platform for games, when it is more like a scribble on a piece of paper while somebody was bored during a telephone conversation than anything resembling a game.
voteText: 43 of 67 people (64%) found this review helpful 6 people found this review funny

reviewText: My full review can be found on The Backlog.[www.the-backlog.net]\n\nSuper Space Pug would best be described as a Super Space Mess. The hitboxes are absolutely atrocious and will cause you to get hit by things you shouldn't have actually been hit by. There's pickups, but you'll find yourself getting hit by miles away objects trying to get them. The pug moves far too fast for being in space". The description does mention that this is a "speedy bullet hell"
date: but I would describe this as being too fast and not enough bullet hell.\n\nThere are no unlockables to get
recommended: leaving you with a black pug on a black background shooting at dark coloured objects (since
voteText: you're in space). There's no options menu
helpfulPercent: and the leaderboards will take you out of the game (and
votesHelpful: in one case after a level
votesTotal: trying to cancel out of submitting my score closed the game).\n\nI cannot recommend Super Space Pug at all. If you're in the market for bullet hell games
votesFunny: there are far better ones out there on Steam."

reviewText: This game is garbage. This is a poorly made game, hence the price. reviewText:
I love the Pug Series
The first one
The second one
But this one is just broken
When I first realized the developer released a new pug game into the series I was surprised that it came really early
I didn't honestly care so I just went on to buying the game
The first thing I noticed was that it came on a windows screen only
All the other pug games were made in unity allowing Full Screen and Windowed with the ability to change your resolution
So I didnt mind that either
Next on I went to play the game
and it was just wrong
the Leaderboards werent in game except gave you a link to a poorly made website
The hit boxes are too big and makes death too easy
There were many game breaking bugs and glitches that I found of too in-game
The only pro I have for this game is that it had a pretty good soundtrack as always

The game was rushed by the developer and poorly pollished
I prefer you get Turbo Pug and Super Mega Neo Pug instead of this
My review will not change unless the developer releases further updates fixing all of this
